title: Ben Platt on the Unfortunate Timeliness of His ‘Parade’ Revival
description: The 29-year-old actor, best known for his Tony-winning turn in “Dear Evan Hansen,” this week returns to the stage at New York City Center.
dc:creator: Michael Paulson
media:credit: Vincent Tullo for The New York Times
media:description: “Parade,” Ben Platt said, “is all about not only antisemitism, but the failure of the country to protect lots of marginalized groups, and we’re all feeling that really intensely right now.”
